CustomField.description: Checking this box creates 5 email campaigns for this webinar. Hidden field checked through the "Create Campaigns" action. 8/4/2023 NOTE: The Process Builder this triggered has been deactivated due to apex cpu timeout. Please use the Create Campaigns screen flow instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking this box creates 5 email campaigns for this webinar. Hidden field checked through the "Create Campaigns" action.
CustomField.label: Create Campaigns
